fields.description:
On a CentOS 7 install from source with the ufs, clc and cc on the same host the following is a sample of the messages recorded every second in /var/log/messages:

{code}
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: 8: virbr0-nic: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST> mtu 1500 qdisc pfifo_fast master virbr0 state DOWN qlen 500
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: link/ether 52:54:00:96:fe:6a brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: 9: metabr: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc noqueue state UP
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: link/ether 0e:21:ef:83:4b:3b brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: inet 169.254.0.1/16 scope global metabr
May 16 13:57:50 c-23 eucalyptus-cluster: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever

fields.summary: Cluster controller logging to /var/log/messages is excessive

comments.body:
There is similar output for the nc:

{code}
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 1: lo: <LOOPBACK,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 65536 qdisc noqueue state UNKNOWN
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/loopback 00:00:00:00:00:00 brd 00:00:00:00:00:00
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet 127.0.0.1/8 scope host lo
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet6 ::1/128 scope host
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 2: em1: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc mq master br0 state UP qlen 1000
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether b8:ac:6f:8e:c1:ca brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet6 fe80::baac:6fff:fe8e:c1ca/64 scope link
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 3: em2: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST> mtu 1500 qdisc noop state DOWN qlen 1000
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether b8:ac:6f:8e:c1:cb brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 4: midonet: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST> mtu 1500 qdisc noop state DOWN
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether 0e:25:b6:9d:32:3b brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 9: br0: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc noqueue state UP
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether b8:ac:6f:8e:c1:ca brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet 10.111.5.103/16 brd 10.111.255.255 scope global dynamic br0
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft 13738sec preferred_lft 13738sec
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet6 fe80::baac:6fff:fe8e:c1ca/64 scope link
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 10: em1.107@em1: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc noqueue state UP
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether b8:ac:6f:8e:c1:ca brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet 10.107.105.103/16 brd 10.107.255.255 scope global em1.107
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet6 fe80::baac:6fff:fe8e:c1ca/64 scope link
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: 11: em1.116@em1: <BROADCAST,MULTICAST,UP,LOWER_UP> mtu 1500 qdisc noqueue state UP
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: link/ether b8:ac:6f:8e:c1:ca brd ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: inet6 fe80::baac:6fff:fe8e:c1ca/64 scope link
May 20 16:47:36 d-41 eucalyptus-node: valid_lft forever preferred_lft forever
{code}

let me know if I should open a separate issue for this.

Verified. {{ip add show}} outputs are not in /var/log/messages anymore.
